title: Interpretation of the crescent moon in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of the crescent moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the crescent moon in a dream has good and bad connotations. The crescent moon in a person’s dream indicates profit or obtaining a job of great importance. It can also predict that the dreamer will perform Umrah or Hajj in the near future. It is also a sign of money and livelihood with a male child, and God knows best. While the bad thing about it is that seeing the crescent moon can express loneliness and that the dreamer will die alone, with the exception of the red crescent moon in his unpleasant vision, and if he sees a pregnant woman in her dream, this indicates that she will lose . Pregnancy and losing the fetus. A person may see in his dream that he is exploring the Eid crescent to fast the blessed month of Ramadan and find it. This vision indicates abundant livelihood and an abundance of good deeds, and seeing the Eid crescent is good news. . From satisfying desires, achieving success and achieving desired goals, as it indicates the disappearance of sorrows and fatigue. Interpretation of seeing the crescent moon in an unmarried girl’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees a crescent moon in her dream, this is good news that the groom is coming to her, and he will be a wealthy groom, if the crescent moon is green. God Almighty willing. Interpretation of the appearance of the crescent in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees the crescent in her dream, this indicates the abundance of sustenance and good things, and its interpretation varies according to the color it appeared in her dream, so the white crescent is a reference to the husband and it appears to her that it is hers. The husband is loyal to her, and the green crescent is good news for the pregnancy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the crescent in a pregnant woman’s dream: If a pregnant woman sees the crescent in her dream, this vision is good news that she will be blessed with a male child and he will be one of the righteous children for his family, God willing. Interpretation of seeing two crescents in a dream: A person can sometimes see in his dream Two crescents in the sky, not one, and this vision indicates the entry of a new person into the life of the person who had the vision, while traveling, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the crescent and stars in a dream When the dreamer sees in his dream the crescent accompanied by stars in the sky, this vision is praiseworthy and carries a lot of optimism because it portends achieving success. And achieving goals, as well as expressing joy and happiness and meeting a friend or lover. God knows best. For those who want an interpretation of their dream, we receive your comments through the website and we will provide you with the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing numbers and numbers in detail in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number zero in a dream: Zero is the magic number that can multiply numbers and is the master of numbers, and the circular shape of zero in a dream symbolizes stability, nothingness, existence and movement. Seeing zero in a dream symbolizes women and fertility and seeing zero in a dream could be the skin of pregnancy or childbirth for For a married or pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing the number one in a dream. The number one in a dream symbolizes the beginning, priority, and basics, and seeing one in a dream can be a sign of the first love for a single woman. Seeing the number one symbolizes a husband or son-in-law. The number one is a sign of the unity of God The number one can be a sign of strength, spiritual energy, and intelligence, and it can be a symbol of ownership, leadership, success, and management. Interpretation of seeing the number 2 in a dream. The second number in a dream symbolizes a bilateral relationship such as friendship, brotherhood, beauty, femininity, sustenance, and money. There are those who interpreted the second dream as evidence of marriage. From an unmarried man. For a pregnant woman, seeing the number 2 may be a sign that God will bless her with a daughter or twins, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the number 3 in a dream. The number three is not all numbers, it is the number that includes all the qualities that obscures all the qualities. It symbolizes emotions and instincts Seeing the number three in a dream can be a sign of an important and happy event in the dreamer’s life, and it can be a sign of fulfilling desires or obtaining luck, profits, or victory. The number three for a married woman is evidence of the financial and psychological stability in which she lives, and the completion of the lack of... Her life. In general, the number three in a woman’s dream portends good. Interpretation of seeing the number 4 in a dream. The number four is one of the numbers that symbolizes the square, which is a strict and cohesive custom geometric shape, and you can see that the number four symbolizes the four corners of the house. It can be The number four is a symbol of the four seasons, which carries the meaning of stability, commitment and discipline. Seeing the number four suggests that the dreamer is a sincere and ordinary person who does not like to travel and does not like change in his life, so he faints in the affairs of his home and life. An unmarried woman who sees the number 4 in a dream indicates It indicates that she enjoys a stable life in a family and social environment. As for a pregnant woman who sees the number four in a dream, this indicates the approaching date of birth. Interpretation of seeing the number 5 in a dream: The number 5 in a dream indicates the extent of stability and contentment experienced by the dreamer. It is a reference to the five daily prayers. Whether the dreamer abandons prayer or adheres to it. For a pregnant woman, it means the first months of pregnancy and the days remaining after birth. Interpretation of seeing the number 6 in a dream: The number six reflects the beginnings of creation, because God created in six days, and seeing the number six in a dream indicates completion. Business and marriage at its best. Interpretation of seeing the number 7 in a dream. The number seven in a dream is a symbol of good luck. May God grant you success. A married woman seeing the number 7 in a dream can be a sign of

title: The strangest interpretations of seeing the birth of a handsome boy in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the birth of a beautiful child through interpretation books brings joy and happiness whether it is a single woman, pregnant, non-pregnant woman or divorced, and most interpreters have come to the conclusion that seeing the birth of a child. The dream in general is a sign of getting out of fears, overcoming problems and enemies, and starting a new life and the joy of the future, which facilitates experiences and some interpreters see in some cases a sign of stress and problems. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a handsome boyIf the birth of a beautiful boy in a dream is for a single woman or Married, pregnant or divorced woman, the interpretation of different visions depends on the dreamer and his circumstances, and therefore the interpretation of a single woman differs from a married woman and a pregnant woman from a non-pregnant woman, and so we explain that below: If a man dreams that he gives birth to a son, or sees his wife giving birth to a son, then if That man is single, then this indicates his imminent marriage or engagement, and a new beginning in his life. Interpretation of seeing a married man giving birth to a girl. If a man sees that he is giving birth to a girl, this indicates abundant livelihood and a lot of money on the way. As for the interpretation of a dream about a man giving birth in a dream of a married man If this man is married and sees that he has given birth to a boy, this indicates the approaching pregnancy of his wife or the material benefits that will be achieved soon. If his wife is pregnant and sees a boy, then his wife will give birth to a boy, and if a man sees his wife giving birth in a dream and rejoices in his dreams, this means for him a lot of sustenance, kindness, and blessings, and if she dies in a dream, this means the disappearance of kindness, means of livelihood, and the arrival of poverty. But if he sees his wife giving birth A female and does not feel happy in his dreams, then this means poverty, diseases and disasters. But if a married man sees that he is the one who gave birth to a child, then this indicates illness, poverty, the death of the patient, or hardship that befalls the dreamer. Whoever sees a child being born in a dream, this is evidence of his imminent marriage, If he is married, this is evidence that he has attained a dignified and elevated life. If a man sees in a dream that his wife gave birth to a man and was not pregnant, he will obtain treasures. If he sees that his wife gave birth to a sick son, he will be saved from grief and defeat his enemy. Whoever dreams that his wife gave birth to a son, he will have a source. RizkInterpretation of a dream about seeing my friend giving birth: If a girl sees in her dream that her friend is giving birth to a boy, she will soon get engaged or marry her friend. Your dream will be interpreted in seconds on the Egyptian dream interpretation site by Google. But if her friend is married, this means that she has faced problems and will get out of them quickly God willing. Interpretation of a dream about the birth and death of a child for an unmarried woman, and this means that she is marrying a bad person and faces problems because of him, or it may also mean that she faces obstacles in consummating her marriage. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a child for a married woman, meaning that she may become barren and have no children. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a male child for a pregnant woman is an indication of the difficulties she faces during pregnancy and after childbirth or in raising her child. If a pregnant woman sees that she has given birth to a boy, then she will give birth to a woman, and vice versa, and childbirth is a rest after fatigue, because when

title: Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream for senior imams

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing travel in a dream? It is common to see travel in a dream, so many people are looking for an interpretation of seeing travel in a dream. Seeing travel in a dream is a good omen and portends happiness and profit, and it also has many meanings and interpretations that depend on the dreamer's condition, the method of travel, and the place he travels to, so in this article a different website provides you with an interpretation of seeing travel in a dream. Interpretation of seeing someone traveling nearby Seeing a trip of someone close to you in a dream indicates great love for that person and anxiety and fear of his departure or departure, and since the vision stems from the subconscious, the owner of the vision must be reassured and pray to God Almighty. To protect him from those he loves and do not worry. Interpretation of a dream of traveling to a foreign country Whoever sees that he is moving or traveling to a foreign country, this means that he wants to achieve something or wants to reach his goals and is looking for them. This vision is considered promising and the fulfillment of desires and goals. If the dreamer sees that he is traveling on foot in a foreign country, this means that he has reached his goals, but after taking a difficult path. Most commentators say that traveling to a foreign country means great ambition because it can mean achieving one's dreams alone and in a distant place and one can be an expatriate. If the owner of the person sees that he is traveling for fun and adventure, this means that he needs to enjoy his life and needs rest and vacations. Interpretation of a dream of traveling Seeing the same poor person traveling in a dream means that he may become rich. Whoever sees that he is traveling in a dream to rugged and unknown places, this means a warning of the presence of some dangers in his life or that he may get sick. Interpretation of seeing a dream of traveling through valleys and lush green hills is happiness, prosperity and better conditions. Also, the interpretation of seeing travel in a dream can be a sign of the wealth that he will gain from his toil And his toil or the inheritance that he will acquire. This vision may mean that its owner is trying to explore the essence of the people around him and get to know their nature. For whoever sees that he is traveling in a dream, this may mean that his circumstances, environment and living conditions have changed, or that he will have to change his job, it may mean that he must atone for a sin he committed. Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees a new travel bag in her dream, this is evidence of her marriage, just as the red bag in the dream of a single woman indicates marriage, while the white bag indicates engagement, but the black bag in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates her marriage. Failed fasting marriage and divorce. Whoever sees in a dream that he is traveling to a distant place, this is evidence of the desire of one of her family and clan to address her and that her marriage will be happy and successful. Whoever is single and sees that she was traveling on a fast train, this is evidence of her moving to a new life. Interpretation of a dream of traveling for a married woman Any young or married bride who has not yet become pregnant and sees that she is carrying a travel bag, she will soon become pregnant, God willing. If a married woman sees that she is carrying a bag, and this bag is heavy and

title: Interpretation of a dream about a father being sick in a dream for a woman and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a father being sick in a dream for a woman and a man: A person can dream of close people and they have many forms, and a person can see his father sick in a dream, and this is what makes him feel very anxious and rush to search for the meaning of this vision. An unmarried woman sees her father sick in a dream and feels very sad, this means good news for her. The following lines: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is hugging her sick father, this means that the dreamer feels the need for attention and this means that he must feel safe. The sick father in a dream, if he complains about his illness in a dream, and the dreamer calls him in the dream, then this It means that the father will recover if he is sick. The vision also means the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires. If the dreamer sees in a dream that her father is crying from illness and wiping his tears, this means that the dreamer needs someone to provide her with help and support, and God is Great and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself Wearing new shoes in a dream Seeing a dead father sick in a dream The deceased father and seeing him sick in a dream may indicate that the father has not paid his debts, and this means that the dreamer needs to pay them. There are interpretations of seeing the deceased father sick in a dream: Seeing the father in a dream of an unmarried woman complaining of pain in the His head means that her marriage will be delayed. The father of the deceased is sick in a married woman’s dream, meaning that he is suffering from financial crises, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a pregnant woman sees her father dead, this means that the date of birth is approaching. The vision in general means that the deceased needs prayer and charity. If The deceased father was suffering from pain in his neck, which means that he was wasting his money and squandering it on useless matters. See also: Interpretation of the dream of the dog that bit my hand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the father’s illness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the father’s illness in the dream as an indication that... Charity and supplication for the father, and that there are other indications related to the interpretation of seeing the father’s illness in a dream, which we explain. For you as follows: Seeing a father sick in a dream means failure to achieve desires and ambitions. Also, a sick father in one’s dream means that he is doing some not good things. If a man sees his father sick in a dream, it means that the dreamer’s health will deteriorate. Seeing a sick father in The dream means that there will be some material losses. Ibn Sirin also considered the father’s illness in a dream to be a sign that the dreamer is going through a bad psychological state. As the vision indicates the material losses that the dreamer is exposed to. In the event that the dreamer becomes ill, this means that he will recover from his illness. Vision A father in a dream of a married woman complaining of illness means that the dreamer will go through bad circumstances. The vision may indicate the woman’s feeling of loneliness. See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing a thief or a thief by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a sick brother in a dream. Seeing a sick brother in a dream means that the dreamer faces many problems. In his life, these problems increase

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Jeddah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Jeddah in a dream Dear reader, you can find out what the interpretation of a dream about traveling to Jeddah in a dream brings according to what scholars and translators have conveyed, not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Jeddah in a dream Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Jeddah in a dream can be a sign of good changes, and God knows best If a young man is seen traveling to Jeddah, this may indicate his good condition, God willing When a single girl sees, traveling portends good, God willing, as it can express positive changes, and God is Most High and All-Knowing Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Somalia in a dream If a married man dreams of traveling to Somalia, this may be a sign of distance, God knows best As the idea of ​​distance may suggest a feeling of comfort, and God knows the unseen When the dreamer sees traveling to Somalia, it can lead to positive changes, and God knows the unseen Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Somalia in a dream may indicate changes that make him happy, and God is Most High and All-Knowing Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Yemen in a dream Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Yemen in a dream can be a sign of solving problems, and God knows best If a young man sees in a dream that he is traveling to Yemen, this can be a good sign and gets rid of psychological pressure, and God knows best When a single girl sees traveling to Yemen, it may be a sign of getting rid of judgments, and God knows best An absolute vision traveling to Yemen may represent the removal of the pressures you are experiencing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Rome in a dream The interpretation of a dream about traveling to Rome in a dream can be a sign of good changes, and God knows best If a married woman is seen traveling to Rome, it may portend goodness and happiness, God willing When a single girl sees herself traveling in Rome, it may be a sign of kindness, and God knows best If a young man sees himself traveling to Rome in a dream, it may be a sign that he is getting rid of problems, and God is higher and more knowledgeable Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Vienna in a dream The interpretation of a dream about traveling to Vienna in a dream can be a sign of nourishment, and God is higher and more knowledgeable If a young man dreams of traveling to Vienna, it may be a sign of comfort, and God knows best Where the trip indicates goodness and happiness, and God knows best If a single girl sees that she is traveling to Vienna in a dream, it may be a sign of positive changes, and God knows best Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Morocco in a dream The interpretation of a dream about traveling to Morocco in a dream can be evidence of achieving goals, God willing It can also indicate good and new work for the dreamer, and God knows best When you see a married man traveling to Morocco in a dream, it may be a sign of a new job, and God knows best I know the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself traveling to Morocco in a dream, it may be a sign of a new beginning, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Algeria in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Algeria in a dream may be a sign of happiness, God willing. If an unmarried young man dreams of traveling to Algeria, it may represent marriage, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a man flirting with me

preview.html: This dream is only a warning to her and to return to God Almighty and stay away from unrighteous things, and we will learn this through the following lines on our website gptafser.com/, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing a man flirting with me in a dream for a single girl: Seeing an unmarried girl looking at a man flirting with her in a dream and responding To him. She is making big mistakes and atrocities in her life and she doesn't really care. The dream also indicates that he is doing bad things and should stop doing them quickly. The unmarried girl who sees that she is asking a man to caress her in the dream and approach her. This indicates that she is making mistakes On her part, and that she is not succeeding in life, and God knows best. It also explains the difficult things that she is going through in her life at this time, and God knows best. What if an unknown man approached the unmarried girl, and tried to touch her and touched her in the dream. What is meant here is an indication that he is far from God Almighty, commits immorality, and needs to repent. As is evident from her choice of bad things and sins in her life, God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried woman sees that her fiancé is flirting with her and she is enjoying it, this indicates that her engagement has been broken. See also: Interpretation of a dream about someone watching me from The window: Interpretation of seeing a man flirting with me in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees a man flirting with her, then her husband is also dreaming and she is happy. It indicates the happy and peaceful life that this married woman lives with her husband, and God knows best. And if he responds to him in the dream, this indicates that they have gotten rid of problems. The big one they were going through. What if she approached an unknown man and asked him to caress her in a dream and come to her. A sign of the big mistakes that she will make in her life and she will be very sad about them during this period. It also explains that she will fall into some problems and misfortunes in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A married woman who sees someone she knows and is close to, in a dream, is flirting with her vigorously. It shows a mistake she will make with this person and she will regret it a lot. It also indicates that he did not quickly recover from this mistake, and God knows best. The married woman who asks a stranger Caressing her and enjoying him is a sign of a mistake she is making. Interpretation of seeing a man flirting with me in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband, he was caressing her in a dream while she was having fun. She expresses her intense desire to return to him again, and return to her previous life with him. It also indicates that she She still thinks about him and the things they did together in their lives. A divorced woman asks someone she knows to approach her and hit her hard in a dream. This is a sign that there are difficult matters that this divorced woman is going through and she regrets them. It also indicates the immoralities and sins she committed in her life in this Time, and God knows best. It explains that the divorced woman who sees an advanced person in her life flirts with her a lot in dreams. It is important that he wants to marry again and seeks to get it. It also explains that she will face major crises in her life and will not overcome them easily. Either the divorced woman asks a stranger D

title: Interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sunflower oil in a dream: See the point: sunflower oil in the dream, shows the peace of the dreamer’s heart and the comfort he will obtain after a period of fatigue and hardship. And if someone sees in a dream that he is eating sunflower oil in a dream. This is an indication of his recovery from an illness or repayment. His debt if he is in debt. Drinking sunflower oil in a dream indicates that the person with insight is exposed to witchcraft. And if he dreams of anointing his body with sunflower oil, this is a sign that he will be cured of a serious illness in his body. And if someone sees that in a dream he is frying food with sunflower oil. This is a symbol of the presence of greed for insight, and also that he does not trust others. Interpretation of seeing sunflowers in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a sunflower in a dream for an unmarried woman is a good and praiseworthy vision that indicates that her situation will change significantly for the better. It symbolizes in a dream a free girl, as well as strength and support. In her life, she is represented by her father, her brother, or both. And if she sees in her dream that she is looking at a sunflower, this is a sign that there is someone in her life who embraces her and comforts her whenever she faces a problem or faces some distress. Seeing eating sunflower seeds in a dream for a married woman symbolizes the sunflower in a woman’s dream. For a married woman, her husband’s financial situation will change for the better and her life will improve a lot. This vision also indicates that the owner of the vision is a woman of ancient origin who supports her husband. She helps him overcome the problems and difficulties of life with all sincerity. What if a married woman sees in her dream that she smells the scent of sunflowers, then this is a sign She consults her husband on issues and matters that will help her earn money. Interpretation of a dream about peeling a seed in a pregnant woman’s dream: It symbolizes eating seeds in a pregnant woman’s dream, in her feeling of incredible happiness and joy when she heard the news of her pregnancy. Peeling a seed in a pregnant woman’s dream can also indicate Her mood swings between happiness and sadness due to pregnancy. What if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is looking at a lot of sunflowers? This is an indication of her husband’s trip to a far place or for a long time, but it is a trip that will bring them goodness and a lot of livelihood. What if a pregnant woman sees in her dream a gathering Sunflower petals, and this is evidence of her longing to know the sex of her fetus and whether it is male or female. Interpretation of seeing sunflowers in a dream for a divorced woman. See the point Sunflower plant In a dream, a divorced woman is exposed to severe pressure and suffers from the interference of others in her life. Seeing yourself eating sunflower seeds in A single woman’s dream: If she sees a free girl in her dream eating sunflower seeds. This is an indication that she is a girl who chases others and follows their faults and the details of her private life. And if the sunflower seeds that the girl eats in the dream are immature. This is a sign of her desire to communicate with anyone quickly, even if she does not She did not know him well. Interpretation of a dream about seeds for a married woman: If a married woman sees sunflower seeds in her dream, this is a sign that she will become pregnant soon after a long wait, God willing. But if a married woman sees

title: Trimming nails in a dream, hands and feet

preview.html: Cutting nails in a dream on the hands and feet of a single woman. An unmarried girl may see in her dream that she is cutting her nails, hands and feet, like this dream. It suggests a feeling of emptiness and loneliness that may haunt this girl’s life. It also suggests the need for this girl to fill the emotional void. Cutting the girl’s nails indicates Good things are coming, such as her engagement soon to an important young man. And seeing a girl cutting her nails indicates the end of debts, if this dreamer is indebted to someone. And seeing an unmarried woman in her dream cutting her nails, but in reality this dreamer has many problems and obstacles. And this dream Evidence that God Almighty will save them and save them from the problems of this girl. If an unmarried woman commits sins and disobedience and sees in her dream that she cuts her nails easily. This indicates that this dreamer will repent and be freed from his sins and that he will return to God and the teachings of his religion. Also, if she sees a woman For an unmarried woman, in her dream, she cuts her nails, trims them, and also paints them with nail polish. This dream indicates that it is a sign for the girl that she hears happy news. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning teeth for a single woman. Trimming fingernails and toenails in a dream. A married woman is among the people who cut their nails in a dream, and we quote From him: When a married woman sees in her dream that she is cutting her fingernails and toenails, this is evidence of her interest in the affairs of her home and his family and her endeavor to provide what is good for them. And seeing a married woman cutting her long nails is a sign that she will give up sins and bad things in her life. Also, Seeing long nails trimmed indicates repentance, devotion to worship, and avoiding evil. Seeing finger nails trimmed and colored has many signs, including recovery from a disease that was controlling her body and causing her pain. Or the removal of problems and fears from her life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is cutting her nails. And this The vision indicates that he will face many obstacles and problems, and God Almighty is high. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she cannot trim her nails because they have grown. This dream is a vision that a loved one for this woman will die soon. Likewise, if a married woman sees that her nails have grown... She slept more than necessary. This is evidence that there are enemies in the dreamer’s life, and that he is unable to defeat them. Trimming the nails in a dream around the hands and feet of a pregnant woman. This dream comes to the pregnant woman with many signs and signals, including: If the pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is trimming and cutting her nails. This indicates The dream indicates that this woman will achieve her ambitions and everything she wants. Seeing a pregnant woman’s nails being cut in a dream, and her nails are long and she has many worries and problems. This dream indicates that her problems will disappear and her worries will go away. It also indicates the ease of her pregnancy and childbirth and the lack of pain during childbirth. If she sees A pregnant woman dreams that she cannot trim her nails and they keep breaking them. This will be evidence that there are obstacles that prevent the fulfillment of her desires. But if she sees in her dream that she is cutting someone else’s nails, then

title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Children surround us a lot in our lives, so it is natural for us to see them a lot in a dream, whether the child is male or female. Each of them has a different interpretation and this also varies according to the state of the fortuneteller, whether she is male or married. Or pregnant, its interpretation also differs from that of single people, so today we have collected for you through our encyclopedic article many different opinions of Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin, as well as Al-Nabulsi, regarding your interpretation. You see a child in a dream, so follow us...Interpretation of seeing a child in a dreamChildren are beloved of God None of us lives without the presence of children by our side, whether they are relatives, strangers, or even your son, so the possibility of seeing them in a dream is high, as the subconscious mind stores what a person sees and says, as well as what he believes, and many opinions unanimously agree that seeing children in... A dream is desirable, but it varies from female to male, and according to the condition of the sleeper, and this is what you will learn in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a male child in a dream for an unmarried woman. The interpretation of seeing a man in a person’s dream varies depending on the condition in which she sleeps during sleep. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that: Dragging an infant towards an unmarried woman, provided that she has a beautiful face, is evidence of marriage to a good man soon who will be happy in the days of her life. When he sees a beautiful boy in a dream, this is evidence of forgiveness and repentance to God for sins. And the disobedience he committed. When a girl buys a male child in a dream, this is a sign that some problems and pitfalls will enter her life. The crying of a male child is evidence of the girl’s increasing pain and some anxiety. There is another opinion by Ibn Sirin that seeing a male child could be evidence that she achieved her goals and succeeded in Fulfilling her dreams. As for the opinion of the scholar Ibn Shaheen regarding the interpretation of seeing a male in a dream, it is evidence: When the male is carried and held in one dream, this indicates that she will soon marry a man who loves her very much and she will begin a new life with him. When she sees her, this is a sign that goodness and happiness will come. In her life and her worries will go away. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq For married people: A child, in a married woman’s dream, indicates that she will soon give birth to a child who will change her life for the better and fulfill her long-awaited desires. For single people When a girl sees a child playing next to her and approaches him, this is a sign that good things will come soon Her livelihood will increase, in addition to that she will achieve her dreams and be happy in this world. Absolute When you talk to children and play with them, this is a sign of great compensation coming from God to this woman and the fulfillment of her desires and she will be blessed with happiness and abundant luck from this world. The Man When men see young children in a dream, this Evidence that a man will obtain abundant happiness and great sustenance from the world. Interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream for a pregnant woman. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is something worthy of praise and desirable, as it indicates: The pregnant woman will enjoy good health, God willing, and in good health.

The Man When men see young children in a dream, this Evidence that a man will obtain abundant happiness and great sustenance from the world. Interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream for a pregnant woman. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is something worthy of praise and desirable, as it indicates: The pregnant woman will enjoy good health, God willing, and in good health.
